resources.string: It will be displayed in \"To Everyone\" in the inbox of all users, and it will be a message that anyone can answer. The operation picks up the discretion and prejudice, and the adopted one is added to the sender\'s favorite.
Anonymously send a message to Super Idol
Negative content, sexual content, spam, etc. Will not delivered because AI will secretly delete them.
2. Answer everyone\'s message until you receive it!

string-array.name: message
string-array.item: Please tell us your \"I like it but it\'s hard to recommend it to people\"
I\'m not drawing a picture to get a reaction, but I\'m a little sad if I don\'t get a reaction from the picture I drew. What are you guys doing with the motivation to draw picture?
Please tell me how to spend your time, which I think was the most wasted time in my history!
What did you do when you were sleepy during glass? (How to deal with it, how you slept, etc.)
If you want to draw a picture, is it analog or digital? I\'d be happy if you could give me a reason!
How would you respond to a bullying consultation and help from an SNS follower
